review: It didn't do all I expeded.
author: Robert Caine

review: I mean it is what it is, I didn't like how this only streamed 720P from my laptop's videos. It wasn't what I was looking for, what I needed was an HDMI adapter since my laptop didn't have one. That was the only issue so I bought this to stream my videos, but it disappointing me. However this is not a bad product, for people who are just streaming YouTube or Netflix you'll get the quality you want. I just found it more helpful for me that I connect an HDMI cable instead.
author: Jimmy

review: I like the idea but you have to have a strong internet connection for it to work properly.I had to return it because of this, but it's a great product.
author: Gregory

review: It is a good thing. But it freezes sometimes. I used to hook my laptop to TV with a HDMI cable, but Chromecast has made it easy for me to watch Youtube  even from my phone device.
author: samza "samaza"

review: Love this little gadget! I just keep buying them for gifts now!
author: FairOphelia9

review: Good price and order was processed properly. Chromecast = Awesome. As well as using with handheld devices, Google has added a cast button in their Chrome browser so you can just use laptop and do anything.
author: Amazon Customer

review: Not sure what I ever did without mine.  I can't get enough of it!  Best money  I've ever spent
author: Emily Bowers

review: Not bad.  Love the easy portability of it.  I also have the fire tv stick.  If I didn't have a lot of purchased media on google play and was trying to decide between the 2, I would go with the fire tv stick.  Didn't realize how much I would like the remote.  So much better than using my phone.  Except when using youtube, that's easier when using your phone/tablet.
author: B.N.

review: Love it i have one on every tv in my house... Way better then Apple TV and is cheeper too
author: Eric C
